sources.title: The Tormenting | Full Movie | Mystery Horror | Laura Mitchell
sources.description:
The Tormenting - Amy is a doctor trying to open her own clinic. After visiting a property, Amy is tormented by supernatural nightly visions of a young girl who met a grim death. Amy seeks to find the culprits and bring the girl's soul to peace.
2016.  Stars: Laura Mitchell, Steve Baran, Eric Schweig
*Licensed from Breaking Glass pictures. All rights reserved*

metadata.Plot: When playwright Claire is invited to set her latest work at a rural theatre company, her fiance Monica tags along for a much-needed vacation. Upon encountering Mutty, an enigmatic groundskeeper with a gross lack of social boundaries, Monica's hopes for respite, her future with Claire, and her very sanity are thrown into jeopardy.
metadata.Actors: Brian Harlan Brooks, Josephine Decker, Dameka Hayes
